title: Upgrading damafe

title: Firefox Browser  Application Menu no Email ID or 'Manage Account' or 'Sync' in Settings or elsewhere... n
content:
Thanks to all you support gurus who give your time to assist non-tech guys like me:

Despite Updating Firefox and logging in to my Firefox Account on each computer to sync my devices, on this computer in Application Menu there is no Email ID or 'Manage Account' or 'Sync' in Settings or elsewhere; Am wanting to Send Tab and do other sync work but to no avail... Have windows 7 operating on 4 computers, 3 have sync but not this one. Have combed through Application menu and settings with a fine tooth comb. Searched online. Tried this tried that. But Ill try anything again.

Many thanks for any education anybody can give. Kind Regards Doug
creator: douglass.lindsay111

title: missing firefox account icon from toolbar
content:
The firefox account icon is missing from the firefox toolbar. While customizing the toolbar, the firefox account icon was dragged out of the firefox window instead of back into the extra toolbar icon area that pops up when customizing the toolbar. This seems to have killed the firefox account icon. I have tried reinstalling firefox, even deleting all the the firefox and mozilla settings but the firefox account icon does not come back.

On other machines (mostly VMs) the firefox account icon shows right up when using the firefox sync feature to configure firefox on a new installation.

Can I get the firefox account icon back somehow?
creator: tehringo+firefox

creator: mechanicdave

title: Choices in setting not checking. Can't tell what is on or off with 91.0!
content: None of the boxes in my setting are changing when I click on them. I have never had this problem before, and only since the 91.0 update today. I can't see what I've turned on or off, and it took me more than 20 minutes of experimenting to discover which choice I accidentally checked when my cat jumped onto my arm (the mouse button clicked before he stepped on the scroll wheel). I can't adjust anything if I can't see which choices I'm making, or which I don't think need to be changed. I did a fresh reinstall after, but having the same problem. The image was taken afterward. In it, I have tried to activate three choices. Can you tell me which ones? I can't tell, because none of the boxes have changed. And where did my separate tabs go? Having inactive tabs not separated, while the active tab is just floating there - literally, it is not just a floating sign acting as a tab - is seriously distracting. Is there a way to change this to, at the very least, make the inactive tabs separate again so the active one isn't such an independent eyesore?
creator: Bing1952

title: Can not load yahoo.
content: Ever since the update of Firefox 90.0.2 (20210721174149) I can not go to yahoo.com. The latest version of Firefox 91.0 (20210804193234) still has not fixed this problem. This is on a windows 10. My old windows 7 machine updated to version Firefox 90.0.2 (20210721174149) will go to yahoo.
creator: rnrmcelroy

title: email address no longer valid

title: FF 91 white background with no borders
content: After FF 91 installed when I go to something like the Watch page on Facebook, there is no border around content to define it and as a result (?) on my videos the controls such as the Audio button is nearly invisible off to the side of the content. While I can see a symbol there is nothing to click on that is visible but clicking above the audio symbol on pure white will turn the audio for the video on. There is no slider visible. If I click on a video to make it larger there is not minimize button in the upper left like there used to be. This is entirely broken. I don't want to downgrade as it is my understanding I would have to create a new account and then try to resync my other devices. I will have to abandon FF if this isn't fixed or until I learn how to fix this. I tried turning strict privacy off to no avail and changing the them to no effect.
creator: santa
